description.narrative: This activity (Internal Risk Facility) is a component of Burma Humanitarian Assistance and Resilience Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Humanitarian assistance' and a budget of £1,664,447. This component benefits Myanmar, and works in the following sector(s): Disaster prevention and preparedness. , with the following implementing partners: Oxford Policy Management, Palladium International Ltd (UK), RedR, United Nations Development Programme (UNDP). The start date is 20-11-2017 and the end date is 30-06-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
